abstract.t: This document defines the base metadata format for Internet MediaGuides (IMGs), applicable to a wide variety of Internet hosts andcommunication links. IMG metadata describes files, resources andmultimedia programs available for streaming or downloading viamulticast or unicast. An IMG metadata model, semantics of the IMGmedia metadata entities, and an XML-based framing structure for IMGmedia metadata are defined. The aim is to reuse existing metadatastandards for the IMG metadata format where possible.
